member.name: T:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame
member.summary: Class that contains methods for a number game.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame.StartNewGame
member.summary: Resets rounds and score to default values (0).

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame.PlayRound
member.summary: Method that determines if the game is not over yet and generates a new number list. The score is calculated and stored.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame.GenerateResult
member.summary: Method that returns the final score.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame.IsGameOver
member.summary: Method that determines if the player has played 5 rounds.
member.returns: Whether or not the game is over.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberGame.CalculateRoundScore
member.summary: Method that calculates the score for the round based on the frequency of numbers in the array.

member.name: T:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberList
member.summary: Class that creates the list of numbers used by NumberGame.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberList.FillNumberList
member.summary: Method that fills the list of integers with randomly generated values. Returns the list of integers.

member.name: M:KatoLefebvre_Assignment1.NumberList.CalculateFrequency
member.summary: Method that calculates the frequency of the numbers generated. Returns the frequency to be calculated into the score.
